name: Jumpdude
description:
Jumpdude is a puzzle game with a shifting perspective
Use the flip mechanic to flip between 2d and 3d
Controls
Arrowkeys or WASD to move
Spacebar to Jump
FLIP with Q
R to Restart Level

P to open menu

Build 0.1 includes 5 levels and 1 secret area
This is my first game and its pretty jank but i fully intend on releasing patches in the future to address bugs as well as add new levels and polish up some of the mechanics

If you find any bugs or have suggestions about the gameplay leave a comment below, looking for all the feedback i can get to make my monstrosity suck less <3
